00013 void NonmemTranslator::generateMonteParsNamespace() const
00014 {
00015   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016   // Generate the MontePars namespace if Monte is requested.
00017   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018   if( !myIsMonte )
00019     {
00020       return;
00021     }
00022   ofstream oMontePars( fMontePars_h );
00023   if( !oMontePars.good() )
00024     {
00025       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00026       snprintf( mess, 
00027         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00028         "Failed to create %s file.", fMontePars_h );
00029       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_STD_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00030       throw e;
00031     }
00032   oMontePars << "//==============================================================================" << endl;
00033   oMontePars << "// " << endl;
00034   oMontePars << "// " << myDescription << endl;
00035   oMontePars << "// " << endl;
00036   oMontePars << "// The namespace MontePars exports the values needed by monteDriver.cpp." << endl;
00037   oMontePars << "// " << endl;
00038   oMontePars << "// The user requested the " << (getTarget()==POP? "population":"individual");
00039   oMontePars << " analysis." << endl;
00040   oMontePars << "// " << endl;
00041   oMontePars << "//==============================================================================" << endl;
00042 
00043   oMontePars << "#ifndef MONTEPARS_H" << endl;
00044   oMontePars << "#define MONTEPARS_H" << endl;
00045   oMontePars << endl;
00046 
00047   oMontePars << "#include <spk/SpkValarray.h>" << endl;
00048   oMontePars << endl;
00049 
00050   oMontePars << "namespace MontePars{" << endl;
00051   oMontePars << "   enum METHOD { adapt, grid, plain, miser, monte, vegas };" << endl;
00052   oMontePars << "   const enum METHOD method = ";
00053   if( myIntegMethod == GRID )
00054     oMontePars << "grid;" << endl;
00055   else if( myIntegMethod == MISER )
00056     oMontePars << "miser;" << endl;
00057   else if( myIntegMethod == ADAPT )
00058     oMontePars << "adapt;" << endl;
00059   else if( myIntegMethod == VEGAS )
00060     oMontePars << "vegas;" << endl;
00061   else //if( myIntegMethod == PLAIN )
00062     oMontePars << "plain;" << endl;
00063 
00064   oMontePars << "   const int nEval = " << myIntegNEvals << ";" << endl;

00066   for( int i=0; i<myIntegNEvals; i++ )
00067     {
00068       if( i > 0 )
00069         oMontePars << ", ";
00070       oMontePars << myIntegNumberEvals[i];
00071     }
00072   oMontePars << " };" << endl;
